text-node.description: Calls a series of sub-pipelines to export the storefront catalog to FiftyOne.
The catalog export operation. Calls sub-pipelines to create the export folder, generate the XML feeds, zip them up, and upload them to the FiftyOne FTP site.
Creates the categories export XML feed.
Creates the kits export XML feed.
Creates the products export XML feed.
Validates the data in the storefront catalog and creates an error log that gets emailed to the administrator.
Generates the batch number and creates the export folder to contain the export files.
Cleans up export files from previous FiftyOne catalog export operations.
Checks the FiftyOne FTP site for .err files. If found, they are moved locally and the administrator is emailed.

key-binding.alias: "Failure while creating export folder for catalog validation"
"Failure while deleting old catalog export files"
"Export Errors Detected on Fifty One FTP"
